thread.section_title: Road Runner Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Road Runner Sports | www.roadrunnersports.com
thread.title: Lin Abbey
thread.title_full: Road Runner Sports reviewed by Lin Abbey

author: Lin Abbey
title: Lin Abbey
text: Love, love the online shopping experience - easy site to navigate, the RR descriptions and reviews are reliable and helpful, AND I just love getting the order update and tracking updates. I also called today to ask about a backordered product - the customer reps are knowledgable and upbeat, likely much more so than most of us could be on an early Sunday morning. Thanks RR Sports - love you guys!
